msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
1st pass of rename according to the spec http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Dropping+the+Fx+Prefix

Flex now requires CSS Style declarations to declare @namespace rules and disambiguate between halo and spark components using CSS 3 namespace prefixes on type selectors. At compile time, this namespace information will be used to map type names to qualified ActionScript class names. At runtime, type selectors are matched on qualified ActionScript class name (for example mx.controls.Button rather than just Button). Flex 3 applications must be compiled with -compatibility-version=3.0.0 to get unqualified CSS type selector behavior.
QE: Yes, this build may help in updating test cases to use the new namespaces and class names.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Remove style metadata for the non-inheriting verticalAlign, paddingLeft, paddingTop, paddingRight, paddingBottom styles.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Initial support for mirroring: added mirror and dir properties to IVisualElement, mirroring logic to UIComponent, GraphicElement, UIMovieClip.  Mirroring in mx.core.SpriteVisualElement is just a stub.  Support for the mirror bit and the mirror transform is in mx.core.AdvancedLayoutFeatures.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fallout from optimizing the number of times text has to be composed for TextBox/TextGraphic.

If the text has certain styles, such as textAlign that is not left-aligned or verticalAlign that is not top-aligned, the text must be recomposed when the size changes so that it's moved to the proper place within the new boundaries.
QE Notes: tests that passed: TextGraphic, layout3D, Button, Radiobutton, checkin tests
Reviewers: will be Gordon on his return
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Optimize the number of times text has to be composed.  It's preferred to clip already composed text, rather than recomposing the text.
All 480 mustella GraphicTags tests still pass.
QE Notes: yes, this will need extensive testing, and I can give you test cases, but we should do it at the same time we test the new clipping code
